user_exits.zh: 用户已存在，请登录或使用其他用户名注册。
user_exits.en: User already exists. Please login or register with a different username.

broken_image_file.zh: 无法读取此图片。请确保这是安放生成的 PNG 图片，并且在传输过程中没有被转换或压缩。

username_mismatch.zh: 此账户无权限读取此文件。请确保当前登陆的用户名与创建图片的用户名相同
username_mismatch.en: This account does not have permission to access this file. Please make sure the currently logged-in username matches the one that created the image.
